mod_list.name: Ender IO Integration with Tinkers' Construct
Blood Smeltery: A TCon Addon for Blood Magic
Ender IO Integration with Tinkers' Construct
Just A Ore Processing Compatibility Attempt: Customized

subterranean_armor.name: Subterranean
subterranean_armor.desc: oWe have to go deeper!r\nYour armor is more durable below sea level.

travel_slowfall_armor.name: Traveller's Cloak (Slow Fall)
travel_slowfall_armor.desc: oLet the wind carry you.r\nYou fall much slower.

cheapskate.name: Cheapskate
cheapskate.desc: oCheeky!r\nStone is bad. Your tool has less durability.

tconevo.staggering.name: Staggering
tconevo.staggering.desc: o...and stay bashed!r\nThis weapon briefly immobilizes enemies on fully-charged hits.

spiky.name: Spiky
spiky.desc: o200% cooler with spikes!r\nBlocking and getting hurt deals damage to the attacker.

tconevo.luminiferous.name: Luminiferous
tconevo.luminiferous.desc: oRelativistic!r\nThis weapon reveals the positions of struck enemies.

lightweight.name: Lightweight
lightweight.desc: oSwift like the wind!r\nIncreases the overall speed of your tool when mining and attacking.

moldable1.name: Moldable
moldable1.desc: oMatre Chocolatier.r\nBlend additional modifiers into your tool.

cheapskate_armor.name: Cheapskate
cheapskate_armor.desc: oMight be a knockoff!r\nStone is bad. Your armor has less durability.

tconevo.photovoltaic_armor.name: Photovoltaic
tconevo.photovoltaic_armor.desc: oEmissions-free!r\nThis armour absorbs sunlight to recharge itself.

tconevo.relentless.name: Relentless
tconevo.relentless.desc: oSwift strikes!r\nThis weapon induces a shorter invulnerability period in struck enemies.

tconevo.attuned_vicio_armor.name: Attuned (Vicio)
tconevo.attuned_vicio_armor.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis armour piece is aligned with Vicio and grants speed after taking damage.

tconevo.juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
tconevo.juggernaut.desc: oA titanic strike!r\nThis weapon deals increased damage based on its wielder's current health.

tconevo.attuned_bootes_armor.name: Attuned (Bootes)
tconevo.attuned_bootes_armor.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis armour piece is aligned with Bootes and summons flares after taking damage.

moldable2.name: Moldable
moldable2.desc: oMatre Chocolatier.r\nBlend additional modifiers into your tool.

tconevo.willful_armor.name: Willful
tconevo.willful_armor.desc: oYour soul is mine!r\nThis armour ensnares the souls of those that would attack it.

aridiculous_armor.name: Aridiculous
aridiculous_armor.desc: oTurn up the heat!r\nThe armor works better in hotter environments.

splitting2.name: Splitting II
splitting2.desc: Three for one!r\The sudden acceleration of releasing an arrow cause it to split into three.

disease.name: Diseased
disease.desc: oFleas on Rats!r\nOpponents get inflicted with Plague.

musicofthespheres.name: Music of the Spheres
musicofthespheres.desc: o"The earth is flat!" said Stever\nThe tool doubles as a movable boombox.

alien.name: Alien
alien.desc: oThe stats feel off...r\n..as if they're changing! Maybe time will tell?

tconevo.superdense_armor.name: Superdense
tconevo.superdense_armor.desc: oNot overpowered!r\nThis armour slightly mitigates most forms of incoming damage.

anticorrosion.name: Anti-Corrosion
anticorrosion.desc: oFor the times when you splash the chemicalr\nEvery tick, there is a small chance that the holder's poison is healed (when held in hand).

insatiable.name: Insatiable
insatiable.desc: oDevour!r\nDuring combat you deal more and more damage but also consume more and more durability.

fiery.name: Fiery
fiery.desc: oSo hot right now!r\nBonus fire damage, sets your enemies on fire.

breakable.name: Breakable
breakable.desc: oThis side up!r\nProjectiles have a 50% chance to break on impact.

tconevo.attuned_fornax.name: Attuned (Fornax)
tconevo.attuned_fornax.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis tool is aligned with Fornax and ignites enemies on fully-charged hits.

tconevo.fluxed_armor.name: Fluxed
tconevo.fluxed_armor.desc: oIt's been years!r\nThis armour consumes energy before durability.

travel_sack_armor.name: Traveller's Knapsack
travel_sack_armor.desc: oKeep your valuables together!r\nGives you a second storage space.

botanical1.name: Botanical
botanical1.desc: oI eat zombies for breakfastr\nIncreases the amount of modifier slots; the effect stacks greatly.

tconevo.evolved_armor.name: Evolved
tconevo.evolved_armor.desc: oBalanced, as all things should be.r\nThis armour grants an energy shield and can be upgraded by fusion crafting.

tconevo.final_guard_armor.name: Final Guard
tconevo.final_guard_armor.desc: oLook out!r\nThis armour will save you from death if it has enough stored energy.

tconevo.draconic_arrow_damage.name: Arrow Damage
tconevo.draconic_arrow_damage.desc: oYou got peeped!r\nThis ammo deals greater damage.

lightweight_armor.name: Lightweight
lightweight_armor.desc: oSwift like the wind!r\nIncreases your overall movement speed.

tconevo.opportunist.name: Opportunist
tconevo.opportunist.desc: oI've been waiting for this!r\nThis weapon deals increased damage to debuffed targets.

vengeful_armor.name: Vengeful
vengeful_armor.desc: oThey'll pay for this!r\nYour attackers might not feel great after hitting you.

flame.name: Inferno
flame.desc: Burn baby burn!r\nSets enemies on fire for 10 seconds, and deals additional dragon flame damage.

dire.name: Dire-Hit
dire.desc:
oIt's super effective!
rYour tool will always land critical hits so long as you are at full health!

moldable2_armor.name: Moldable
moldable2_armor.desc: oMatre Chocolatier.r\nBlend additional modifiers into your armor.

travel_goggles_armor.name: Traveller's Goggles (Zoom)
travel_goggles_armor.desc: oStraiiight through your armor.r\nYou can zoom in on far sights.

terrafirma1.name: Terrafirma
terrafirma1.desc: oSolid earthr\nWhile this tool is in your hand (or this armor is worn), you will heal over time.

enderference.name: Enderference
enderference.desc: oAnti-Teleport!r\nPrevents Endermen from teleporting around for a short time.

absorbent_armor.name: Absorbent
absorbent_armor.desc: oMore absorbent than other brands.r\nYour armor gets stronger in water and rain.

powerful_armor.name: Powerful
powerful_armor.desc: oThis hand of mine is burning red...ish white!r\nAttack damage increased.

tconevo.aura_siphon.name: Aura Siphon
tconevo.aura_siphon.desc: oWex trionis!r\nThis weapon converts some damage dealt to bonus mana.

poisonous_armor.name: Poisonous
poisonous_armor.desc: oSo many to kill... so little time.r\nPoisons enemies on contact.

petramor.name: Petramor
petramor.desc: oSo much stone, must see it all!r\nYour tool loves stone, it literally wants to absorb it (for durability).

xu_xp_boost.name: Experience Boost
xu_xp_boost.desc: Gives bonus XP when mining or slaying mobs.

hive_defender.name: Hive Defender
hive_defender.desc: For Queen and Colony!r\nDeals +8 extra damage against death worms and +4 damage against non-arthropods.

mending_armor.name: Mending Moss
mending_armor.desc: oIt's alive!r\nPicked up XP is stored in the armor. It will slowly use up the XP to regenerate durability.

spades.name: Spades
spades.desc: oTrump suit: Make Tinkers Great Again!r\nThe lower your health, the more damage you do.

possessed.name: Possessed
possessed.desc: J'zahar's will descends on the instrument of destruction, crying out for the essences of life, making tool occasionally speak.

unnamed.name: He Who Must Not Be Named
unnamed.desc: oIt's you-know-who...r\nBonus damage accrued for each entity of the same type as the target close to it.

tconevo.draconic_attack_damage.name: Attack Damage
tconevo.draconic_attack_damage.desc: oTons of damage!r\nThis weapon deals increased melee damage.

tconevo.attuned_lucerna_armor.name: Attuned (Lucerna)
tconevo.attuned_lucerna_armor.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis armour piece is aligned with Lucerna and grants night vision.

tconevo.attuned_pelotrio_armor.name: Attuned (Pelotrio)
tconevo.attuned_pelotrio_armor.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis armour piece is aligned with Pelotrio and repairs itself over time.

tconevo.piezoelectric.name: Piezoelectric
tconevo.piezoelectric.desc: oElectromechanical!r\nThis weapon converts damage from fully-charged hits into usable energy.

calcic_armor.name: Calcic
calcic_armor.desc: oFor stronger bones.r\nMilk rejuvenates both you and your armor.

frost.name: Blizzard
frost.desc: Ice-ice baby!r\nFreezes enemies in a block of ice for 10 seconds, and deals additional dragon frost damage.

tconevo.aftershock2.name: Aftershock II
tconevo.aftershock2.desc: oLaevatein!r\nThis weapon deals additional magical damage on fully-charged hits.

hearts.name: Hearts
hearts.desc: oHey, what's with that plus sign on that guy's mod?r\nThe higher your health, the more damage you do.

endspeed.name: Endspeed
endspeed.desc: oQuantum speed!r\nProjectiles instantly travel to their destination.

tconevo.fae_voice.name: Voice of the Fae
tconevo.fae_voice.desc: oHey, listen!r\nThis weapon may summon pixies to attack foes.

shocking.name: Shocking
shocking.desc: oBzzzzzt!r\nRunning around, breaking blocks or hitting things charges your tool. Hitting an enemy discharges it, dealing damage and providing a speed boost. Mining a block discharges it, giving a mining speed boost.

tconevo.absorption_armor.name: Absorption
tconevo.absorption_armor.desc: oKnockoff runic shielding?r\nThis armour grants additional absorption hearts.

shulkerweight_armor.name: Shulkerweight
shulkerweight_armor.desc: oLook, up in the sky!r\nIncreases your jumping power.

hailhydra.name: Hail Hydra
hailhydra.desc: oHeadsr\nRandom explosions plague your enemies. Also, when you are attacked, there is a chance to get Absorption.

tconevo.gaia_will_ahrim_armor.name: Will of Ahrim
tconevo.gaia_will_ahrim_armor.desc: oDusty ol' tome.r\nCritical Hits apply a strong weakness effect.

thaumic.name: Thaumic
thaumic.desc: oYou're back.r\nA tool with this modifier gains 1 extra modifier slot, or 2 extra slots if either at least 3 parts have this trait, or the tool is made entirely out of parts with this trait.

duritos.name: Duritae
duritos.desc: oDoesn't taste as good as it sounds.r\nYour tool lasts longer ...most of the time.

splinters.name: Splinters
splinters.desc: oOuch!r\nBe careful not to catch a splinter!

challenger.name: Challenger
challenger.desc:
oChallenger
rHigher difficulty increases mining speed, damage, and defense/toughness.

tconevo.apiary_affinity_armor.name: Apiary Affinity
tconevo.apiary_affinity_armor.desc: oBee-utiful!r\nThis armour protects its wearer from bees.

travel_belt_armor.name: Traveller's Belt (Storage)
travel_belt_armor.desc: oStrength training!r\nGives you a second hotbar.

dense_armor.name: Dense
dense_armor.desc: oHard...er.r\nYour armor lasts longer when it has less durability.

sticky_armor.name: Sticky
sticky_armor.desc: oGet it off, get it off!r\nSlows down anyone who attacks you.

instantbreak.name: Geocentric Disintegration
instantbreak.desc: oSabotage Maniacs!r\nDigger made of this material can dig regardless of the hardness of the block.

infernal_armor.name: Infernal
infernal_armor.desc: oThe latest in demonic fashion.r\nExtra protection from non-Nether mobs.

challenger_armor.name: Challenger
challenger_armor.desc:
oChallenger
rHigher difficulty increases mining speed, damage, and defense/toughness.

botanical2.name: Botanical II
botanical2.desc: oI eat zombies for breakfastr\nIncreases the amount of modifier slots; the effect stacks greatly.

apprentice_armor.name: Apprentice
apprentice_armor.desc:
oPower of study
r1/10 of incoming damage becomes experience but hurts you 10% more

tconevo.aftershock3.name: Aftershock III
tconevo.aftershock3.desc: oLaevatein!r\nThis weapon deals additional magical damage on fully-charged hits.

moldable1_armor.name: Moldable
moldable1_armor.desc: oMatre Chocolatier.r\nBlend additional modifiers into your armor.

stiff.name: Stiff
stiff.desc: oUnmoving!r\nBlocking reduces the damage taken even more.

tconevo.chilling_touch_armor.name: Chilling Touch
tconevo.chilling_touch_armor.desc: oIce is nice!r\nThis armour briefly slows attackers.

tconevo.crystalline.name: Crystalline
tconevo.crystalline.desc: oYou could buy a very small piano!r\nThis weapon deals greater damage at higher durability.

steady_armor.name: Steady
steady_armor.desc: oStand your ground!r\nLess knockback for you, more for your attacker.

mundane2_armor.name: Mundane II
mundane2_armor.desc: oWeapons are for chumps!r\nBonus protection against unarmed attackers.

blindrage.name: Blind Rage
blindrage.desc:
oWho said you needed to see your enemies?
rDeal double damage when blinded

tconevo.mana_infused_armor.name: Mana-Infused
tconevo.mana_infused_armor.desc: oMining in the database?r\nThis armour repairs itself using mana.

magnetic2.name: Magnetic II
magnetic2.desc: oHow do they work?!r\nHitting things attracts nearby things?!

thundering.name: Thundering
thundering.desc: oRise, Thor!r\nSummon a thunderbolt on impact.

tconevo.fertilizing.name: Fertilizing
tconevo.fertilizing.desc: oGreen terra!r\nThis tool can be used to fertilize crops at a large durability cost.

twilit.name: Twilit
twilit.desc:
oThe Twilight Forest's illuminating blessing.r
Speedier in the Twilight Forest.
More damage outside the Twilight Forest.

spectre.name: Spectre
spectre.desc:
bSpectral
Each part gives additional Reach potion effect

aquaspeed_armor.name: Aquaspeed
aquaspeed_armor.desc: oIt's getting wet in here!r\nThe armor is unhindered by water and loves rainy evenings.

tconevo.attuned_evorsio.name: Attuned (Evorsio)
tconevo.attuned_evorsio.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis tool is aligned with Evorsio and destroys blocks faster.

tconevo.draconic_attack_aoe.name: Attack AOE
tconevo.draconic_attack_aoe.desc: oYoshitsune!r\nThis weapon strikes enemies in a large area.

tconevo.photosynthetic_armor.name: Photosynthetic
tconevo.photosynthetic_armor.desc: oPhotosynthesis... photosynthesis...r\nThis armour absorbs sunlight to repair itself.

vis_vacuum.name: Vis Vacuum
vis_vacuum.desc: Repairs tool using local and nearby chunks vis in aura.

natureswrath.name: Nature's Wrath
natureswrath.desc: oNature's wrath burning...r\nAfter attacking a mob, there is a chance to burn the target, as well as to heal the player.

soul_sight_armor.name: Traveller's Goggles (Soul Sight)
soul_sight_armor.desc: oHeart is a great power.r\nYou can see the souls of nearby creatures.

tconevo.draconic_arrow_speed.name: Arrow Speed
tconevo.draconic_arrow_speed.desc: oWarp speed!r\nThis weapon fires shots at higher velocity.

dense.name: Dense
dense.desc: oHard...er.r\nYour tool lasts longer when it has less durability.

stonebound.name: Stonebound
stonebound.desc: oYour tool absolutely loves stone!r\nThe tool mines faster as it wears out, but does less damage.

tconevo.bloodbound.name: Bloodbound
tconevo.bloodbound.desc: oThe multitudinous seas incarnadine...r\nThis tool siphons its user's life essence to prevent damage to itself.

tconevo.chain_lightning.name: Chain Lightning
tconevo.chain_lightning.desc: oFull bridge rectifier!r\nThis weapon's fully-charged attacks have a chance of arcing to nearby enemies.

tconevo.gaia_will_karil_armor.name: Will of Karil
tconevo.gaia_will_karil_armor.desc: oDusty ol' tome.r\nCritical Hits apply a wither effect.

tconevo.astral_armor.name: Astral
tconevo.astral_armor.desc: oShimmering!r\nThis armour piece can be attuned to a constellation at an Attunement Altar.

splitting.name: Splitting
splitting.desc: oTwo for one!r\nThe sudden acceleration of releasing an arrow might cause it to split into two.

enderport-4.name: Vanishing II
enderport-4.desc:
oOut of my way!r
Chance to teleport enemies away.

gaze_armor.name: Deadly Gaze
gaze_armor.desc: Force fools to knee before you.

ecological_armor.name: Ecological
ecological_armor.desc: oGreen Power!r\nRenewable resources are so good, they regenerate by themselves!

uplifting_armor.name: Uplifting
uplifting_armor.desc: oI bid you stand!r\nOccasionally regenerates health when hit.

void_shell_armor.name: Warpshell
void_shell_armor.desc: The more warp you have, the more powerfull your armor.

enderport-3.name: Vanishing
enderport-3.desc:
oOut of my way!r
Chance to teleport enemies away.

enderport-2.name: Vanishing
enderport-2.desc:
oOut of my way!r
Chance to teleport enemies away.

blasting.name: Blasting
blasting.desc: oKa-Boom!r\nYou can break non-effective blocks like normal blocks, but they might get destroyed.

dramatic_armor.name: Dramatic
dramatic_armor.desc: oWhat a rush!r\nMight save you in a pinch? Who knows!

vindictive.name: Vindictive
vindictive.desc: oYou are not forgiven!r\nBonus damage to players, and you gain some health by attacking.

tconevo.vampiric.name: Vampiric
tconevo.vampiric.desc: oStill befriending mortals?r\nThis weapon drains life energy from enemies to heal its wielder.

tconevo.infinitum.name: Infinitum
tconevo.infinitum.desc: oProven by induction!r\nThis equipment is indestructible.

tconevo.shadowstep_armor.name: Shadowstep
tconevo.shadowstep_armor.desc: oNothing to see here...r\nThis armour piece grants invisibility in the dark.

tconevo.attuned_discidia_armor.name: Attuned (Discidia)
tconevo.attuned_discidia_armor.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis armour piece is aligned with Discidia and reflects a portion of incoming damage.

aquadynamic.name: Aquadynamic
aquadynamic.desc: oIt's getting wet in here!r\nThe tool is unhindered by water and loves rainy evenings.

tconevo.attuned_evorsio_armor.name: Attuned (Evorsio)
tconevo.attuned_evorsio_armor.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis armour piece is aligned with Evorsio and grants haste.

knockback.name: Knockback
knockback.desc: oHomerun!r\nTeach things how to fly - the cool way.

xu_whispering.name: Whispering
xu_whispering.desc: Will occasionally whisper it's will to you

fruitsalad.name: Fruit Salad
fruitsalad.desc: oYummy yummyr\nA tool with this trait can store up to 5 types of fruits.

sassy.name: Sassy
sassy.desc: oThe sass...r\nCrit on players and bosses.

veiled.name: Veiled
veiled.desc:
oLike a Specter!r
Projectile will be invisible.

spectre_armor.name: Spectre
spectre_armor.desc:
bSpectral
Each part gives additional Reach potion effect

petravidity_armor.name: Petravidity
petravidity_armor.desc: oSo much stone, must see it all!r\nYour armor loves stone, it operates better around it.

tconevo.attuned_bootes.name: Attuned (Bootes)
tconevo.attuned_bootes.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis tool is aligned with Bootes and gains silk touch.

prosperous.name: Prosperous
prosperous.desc: Makes your tool or weapon randomly drop Prosperity Shards.

xu_withering.name: Evil Aura
xu_withering.desc: When held, creates an aura of evil that brings misfortune to the wielder.

naturespower.name: Nature's Power
naturespower.desc: oFeel the power...r\nAfter attacking a mob: 20% chance to burn target. 20% chance to give player Speed. 20% chance to give player Strength.

tconevo.energized1.name: Energized
tconevo.energized1.desc: oBatteries included!r\nThis tool consumes an internal energy buffer before durability.

tasty.name: Tasty
tasty.desc: oOm Nom Nomr\nSmells so good.. You'd rather eat your tool than starve.

rudeawakening.name: Rude Awakening
rudeawakening.desc: oThe hydra grovels before me...r\nDamage pierces armor (mobs only).

axing.name: Axing
axing.desc:
oAxing chad
rBreak wood logs to get x4 planks.

tconevo.evolved.name: Evolved
tconevo.evolved.desc: oBalanced, as all things should be.r\nThis tool uses energy and can be upgraded by fusion crafting.

aridiculous.name: Aridiculous
aridiculous.desc: oTurn up the heat!r\nThe tool works better in hotter environments.

concealed_armor.name: Concealed
concealed_armor.desc: oWhat are you wearing?r\nYour armor becomes invisible.

sharp.name: Sharp
sharp.desc: oCan even cut words!r\nHitting an enemy leaves them bleeding for a short time.

tconevo.aftershock1.name: Aftershock
tconevo.aftershock1.desc: oLaevatein!r\nThis weapon deals additional magical damage on fully-charged hits.

plague_shot.name: Death Cloud
plague_shot.desc: oI Am Become Deathr\nSummons a plague cloud on use, which deals half the damage of the tool!

tconevo.reactive_armor.name: Reactive
tconevo.reactive_armor.desc: oThey'll never get me in here!r\nThis armour grants increasing damage resistance after being attacked.

tconevo.draconic_jump_boost_armor.name: Jump Boost
tconevo.draconic_jump_boost_armor.desc: oA not-so-secret exit!r\nThis armour grants increased jump height.

tconevo.aura_infused_armor.name: Aura-Infused
tconevo.aura_infused_armor.desc: oInto the breach!r\nThis armour passively generates mana.

tconevo.battle_furor.name: Battle Furor
tconevo.battle_furor.desc: oHwt!r\nThis weapon grants its wielder increasing attack damage on fully-charged hits.

axing2.name: Axing II
axing2.desc:
oAxing gigachad
rBreak wood logs to get x6 planks.

shielding_armor.name: Shielding
shielding_armor.desc: oNot so special now, huh?r\nAdditional protection from magical attacks.

indomitable_armor.name: Indomitable
indomitable_armor.desc: oNever give up!r\nMakes your armor more effective.

mana.name: Mana
mana.desc: oRechargeable... with flowersr\nMana can be used in place of durability, and can heal the tool over time.

tconevo.draconic_energy.name: RF Capacity
tconevo.draconic_energy.desc: oUnlimited power!r\nThis tool has increased energy capacity.

momentum.name: Momentum
momentum.desc: oFaster, keep going!r\nMining blocks increases your speed, as long as you keep going.

darkness.name: Eternal Darkness
darkness.desc:
oJoin the dark side...
rYour tool loves the dark so much; it does more damage in the dark.

bloodymary.name: Bloody Mary
bloodymary.desc: oBrought to you by the legendary Queen of England...r\nDeals bonus damage depending on the amount of health already lost by the target. Also, a chance to drop a Coagulated Blood for each hit.

duritos_ranch_armor.name: Duritae
duritos_ranch_armor.desc: oDoesn't taste as good as it sounds.r\nYour armor lasts longer...most of the time.

tconevo.grounding.name: Grounding
tconevo.grounding.desc: oNot so fast!r\nThis weapon's fully-charged hits will briefly prevent enemies from dodging.

tconevo.gaia_wrath.name: Gaia's Wrath
tconevo.gaia_wrath.desc: oLight and darkness!r\nThis weapon fires damaging beams when swung.

bouncy_armor.name: Bouncy
bouncy_armor.desc: oAlways a bounce house!r\nYour armor tends to bounce around.

fins.name: Fins
fins.desc: oSomething's fishy...r\nAttaching fins to the projectiles makes them travel like normal underwater.

high_stride_armor.name: High Stride
high_stride_armor.desc: oJumping is for barbarians.r\nYou can walk up higher steps.

tconevo.attuned_vicio.name: Attuned (Vicio)
tconevo.attuned_vicio.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis tool is aligned with Vicio and grants speed on fully-charged hits.

tconevo.sentient.name: Sentient
tconevo.sentient.desc: oIt knows what you've done...r\nThis tool consumes demon will to increase its power.

enderpickup.name: Direct
enderpickup.desc:
oIt's mine, all mine!r
Teleports mined things directly into your inventory.

tconevo.attuned_armara.name: Attuned (Armara)
tconevo.attuned_armara.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis tool is aligned with Armara and grants resistance on fully-charged hits.

prideful_armor.name: Prideful
prideful_armor.desc: oWhat's narcissism?r\nYou're tougher after getting attacked, at the cost of durability.

tconevo.sundering.name: Sundering
tconevo.sundering.desc: oBalance is weakness...r\nThis weapon weakens attacked enemies.

porous_armor.name: Porous
porous_armor.desc: The stone crumbles beneath your corruption.

glowing_armor.name: Glowing
glowing_armor.desc: oShine brightr\nWhenever it gets too dark, your boots sacrifice a part of themselves to light up your way.

stopbeingselfish.name: Stop Being Selfish
stopbeingselfish.desc: oBrayden stop being selfish!r\nMore damage is added the closer other players are to the attacker.

tconevo.hearth_embrace_armor.name: Hearth's Embrace
tconevo.hearth_embrace_armor.desc: oHeartwarming!r\nThis armour extinguishes fires on its wearer, converting them to healing.

superhot_armor.name: Superhot
superhot_armor.desc: oSUPER. HOT.r\nYou run faster when you're on fire!

tconevo.primordial.name: Primordial
tconevo.primordial.desc: oThe magic! It calls to me!r\nThis weapon converts a portion of its damage to chaos damage.

crumbling.name: Crumbling
crumbling.desc: oCrumble rumble rumbler\nThe tool breaks soft blocks that don't need a tool faster.

withering.name: Withering
withering.desc: oDeath makes monsters of us all.r\nWithers enemies on hit.

invigorating_armor.name: Invigorating
invigorating_armor.desc: oThis feels great!r\nSomehow, you feel healthier.

tconevo.stonebound_armor.name: Stonebound
tconevo.stonebound_armor.desc: oYour armour absolutely loves stone!r\nThis armour grows more effective as it wears out.

brittle.name: Magically Brittle
brittle.desc: Has a random chance of breaking when it takes damage. Can break 'unbreakable' tools.

tconevo.bloodbound_armor.name: Bloodbound
tconevo.bloodbound_armor.desc: oThe multitudinous seas incarnadine...r\nThis armour siphons its user's life essence to prevent damage to itself.

squeaky.name: Squeaky
squeaky.desc: oCute.r\nYour tool is so soft and squeaky it gained silktouch, but deals no damage.

naturesblessing.name: Nature's Blessing
naturesblessing.desc: oWonderful...r\nA chance to drop bread per mob killed or block broken. Sometimes heals the player by a bit after killing a mob.

tconevo.attuned_mineralis.name: Attuned (Mineralis)
tconevo.attuned_mineralis.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis tool is aligned with Mineralis and gains fortune.

terrafirma2.name: Terrafirma II
terrafirma2.desc: oSolid earthr\nWhile this tool is in your hand (or this armor is worn), you will heal over time.

telekinetic_armor.name: Telekinetic
telekinetic_armor.desc: oNo longer bound by reality.r\nYou can reach further.

tconevo.artifact.name: Artifact
tconevo.artifact.desc: oOne-of-a-kind!r\nThis tool cannot be modified or repaired until it is unsealed.

tconevo.attuned_pelotrio.name: Attuned (Pelotrio)
tconevo.attuned_pelotrio.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis tool is aligned with Pelotrio and repairs itself over time.

tconevo.attuned_armara_armor.name: Attuned (Armara)
tconevo.attuned_armara_armor.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis armour piece is aligned with Armara and affords increased protection.

magnetic1_armor.name: Magnetic
magnetic1_armor.desc: oAttractive armor!r\nItems can't help but be drawn to you.

tconevo.culling.name: Culling
tconevo.culling.desc: oOnly the worthy will survive.r\nThis weapon deals increased damage to enemies with less health than its wielder.

night_vision_armor.name: Traveller's Goggles (Night Vision)
night_vision_armor.desc: oI am the night.r\nYou can see in the dark.

tconevo.attuned_octans_armor.name: Attuned (Octans)
tconevo.attuned_octans_armor.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis armour piece is aligned with Octans and grants water breathing.

spiny_armor.name: Spiny
spiny_armor.desc: oThey're called spines, not spikes!r\nGetting hurt deals damage to the attacker at the cost of durability.

autosmelt.name: Autosmelt
autosmelt.desc: oA furnace in tool form!r\nHarvested blocks get smelted.

voltaic_armor.name: Voltaic
voltaic_armor.desc: oBiribiri!r\nGetting hit charges your armor. Once fully charged, get hit again to discharge and deal damage to all surrounding creatures.

global.name: Global Traveler
global.desc: oAround the world... and backr\nShift-right-click a block in order for items from broken blocks and killed entities to get transported in there if it is an inventory.

tconevo.draconic_draw_speed.name: Draw Speed
tconevo.draconic_draw_speed.desc: oWhere's the drama in that?r\nThis weapon can be drawn faster.

tconevo.energized2_armor.name: Energized II
tconevo.energized2_armor.desc: oBatteries included!r\nThis armour consumes an internal energy buffer before durability.

arrow_knockback.name: Flying Knockback
arrow_knockback.desc: Up and At 'Um!r\nThe arrow will inflict strong knockback when it hits an entity.

explosive.name: Explosive
explosive.desc: oKa-boom!r\nAn explosion is created on each hit.

splintering2.name: Splintering II
splintering2.desc: A souvenir for your enemies!r\nHits them more to deal more damage.

chunky.name: Chunkyr
chunky.desc: Makes your tool or weapon drop Mob Chunks.r

amphibious_armor.name: Amphibious
amphibious_armor.desc: oUnderwater fashion.r\nAllows you to breath underwater for a limited time.

tconevo.weightless_armor.name: Weightless
tconevo.weightless_armor.desc: oYou feel ethereal.r\nThis armour is lighter, and so it doesn't impede dodges as much.

ratty.name: Ratty
ratty.desc: oRat Patootier\nRandomly summons rats when used. If used in a fight, summoned rats will try to defend you!

tconevo.attuned_mineralis_armor.name: Attuned (Mineralis)
tconevo.attuned_mineralis_armor.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis armour piece is aligned with Mineralis and causes similar blocks to visibly resonate.

writable1.name: Writable
writable1.desc: oIntellectual!r\nMore words. More Modifiers. It's only logical!

grinding_armor.name: Grinding
grinding_armor.desc:
oJump!
rJump on Ore blocks to crush them into dust.

tconevo.entropic.name: Entropic
tconevo.entropic.desc: oShield breaker!r\nThis weapon inflicts increased entropy on energy shields.

tconevo.overwhelm.name: Overwhelm
tconevo.overwhelm.desc: oHeavy is the hand...r\nThis weapon deals greater damage to armoured targets.

autoforge_armor.name: Autoforge
autoforge_armor.desc: oSo hot, it fixes itself!r\nThe armor repairs itself in fire.

tconevo.gale_force1_armor.name: Gale Force
tconevo.gale_force1_armor.desc: oWind blow!r\nThis armour grants increased flight speed.

tconevo.ultradense_armor.name: Ultradense
tconevo.ultradense_armor.desc: oExtremely not overpowered!r\nThis armour significantly mitigates most forms of incoming damage.

tconevo.mana_affinity2_armor.name: Mana Affinity II
tconevo.mana_affinity2_armor.desc: oWarp not included!r\nThis armour reduces mana costs.

writable2.name: Writable
writable2.desc: oIntellectual!r\nMore words. More Modifiers. It's only logical!

tconevo.attuned_horologium.name: Attuned (Horologium)
tconevo.attuned_horologium.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis tool is aligned with Horologium and freezes time on fully-charged hits.

depthdigger.name: Depth Digger
depthdigger.desc: oFresh-air-a-phobia?r\nThis tool becomes more efficient at lower elevations.

frost2.name: Blizzard II
frost2.desc: Ice-ice baby!r\nFreezes enemies in a block of ice for 15 seconds with added knockback, and deals additional dragon frost damage.

overflow.name: Overflow
overflow.desc: o-2147483648r\nThere is a 25% probability that this weapon directly wipes off half of target's health each attack.

frostwalker_armor.name: Frosty
frostwalker_armor.desc: oAlways stay frosty.r\nYour feet are so cold, they freeze the water around you.

raging2.name: Raging II
raging2.desc: oA desperate solution!r\nYour tool does more damage the lower your health is.

tconevo.astral.name: Astral
tconevo.astral.desc: oShimmering!r\nThis tool can be attuned to a constellation at an Attunement Altar.

magical_modifier.name: Magically Modifiable
magical_modifier.desc: Adds 3 extra modifiers to a tool

tconevo.gale_force2_armor.name: Gale Force II
tconevo.gale_force2_armor.desc: oWind blow!r\nThis armour grants increased flight speed.

reinforced.name: Reinforced
reinforced.desc: oSo strong!r\nEach level adds a 10% chance to not use durability.

tconevo.omnipotence.name: Omnipotence
tconevo.omnipotence.desc: oBegone!r\nThis tool defies the will of gods.

established.name: Well-Established
established.desc: oFree bonus XP!r\nYou gain additional XP.

tconevo.attuned_aevitas.name: Attuned (Aevitas)
tconevo.attuned_aevitas.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis tool is aligned with Aevitas and grants regeneration on fully-charged hits.

tconevo.draconic_shield_recovery_armor.name: Shield Recovery
tconevo.draconic_shield_recovery_armor.desc: oNon-eutactic!r\nThis armour recovers from shield entropy faster.

tconevo.draconic_dig_aoe.name: Dig AOE
tconevo.draconic_dig_aoe.desc: oOnly happy accidents!r\nThis tool breaks blocks in a large area.

tconevo.flux_burn.name: Flux Burn
tconevo.flux_burn.desc: oThe magic ends here.r\nThis weapon drains energy from armour and deals a portion of it as additional damage.

potion_belt_armor.name: Traveller's Belt (Alchemy)
potion_belt_armor.desc: oFor potion lovers.r\nGives you a special potion storage.

tconevo.crystalys.name: Crystalys
tconevo.crystalys.desc: oI'm not afraid of the darkness!r\nThis weapon shatters soul networks to manifest weak blood shards.

cheap_armor.name: Cheap
cheap_armor.desc: oMore bang for your buck!r\nIncreases durability gained when repairing the armor.

tconevo.attuned_discidia.name: Attuned (Discidia)
tconevo.attuned_discidia.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis tool is aligned with Discidia and deals increased damage.

tconevo.soul_rend1.name: Soul Rend
tconevo.soul_rend1.desc: oSoul steal!r\nThis weapon has innate soul-stealing abilities.

tconevo.thundergod_favour_armor.name: Thundergod's Favour
tconevo.thundergod_favour_armor.desc: oInsulated!r\nThis armour grants immunity to lightning strikes.

tconevo.mana_infused.name: Mana-Infused
tconevo.mana_infused.desc: oMining in the database?r\nThis tool repairs itself using mana.

cheap.name: Cheap
cheap.desc: oMore bang for your buck!r\nIncreases durability gained when repairing the tool.

tconevo.impact_force.name: Force of Impact
tconevo.impact_force.desc: oSuffering is magic!r\nThis weapon deals greater damage at high velocity.

tconevo.attuned_lucerna.name: Attuned (Lucerna)
tconevo.attuned_lucerna.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis tool is aligned with Lucerna and illuminates enemies on fully-charged hits.

slashing.name: Slashing
slashing.desc: oA critical hit!r\nCritical hits gain 20% more damage!

holy.name: Holy
holy.desc: oRadiant!r\nDeal bonus damage to undead enemies.

tconevo.thundergod_wrath.name: Thundergod's Wrath
tconevo.thundergod_wrath.desc: oI condemn you!r\nThis weapon calls down a bolt of lightning upon enemies struck at full health.

tconevo.attuned_fornax_armor.name: Attuned (Fornax)
tconevo.attuned_fornax_armor.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis armour piece is aligned with Fornax and grants fire resistance.

parasitic_armor.name: Parasitic
parasitic_armor.desc: oTogether foreverrr...r\nYour armor will feed off you to repair itself.

tconevo.photosynthetic.name: Photosynthetic
tconevo.photosynthetic.desc: oPhotosynthesis... photosynthesis...r\nThis tool absorbs sunlight to repair itself.

tconevo.chaos_resistance_armor.name: Chaos Resistance
tconevo.chaos_resistance_armor.desc: oIridescent!r\nThis armour reduces incoming chaos damage.

vis_siphon_armor.name: Vis Siphon
vis_siphon_armor.desc: Repairs tool using local vis in aura.

elemental.name: Elemental
elemental.desc: oElemental...r\nWhen gravity-affected blocks are destroyed, break all blocks of the same type above and below. Also, a chance to gain various benefits from a sucessful attack.

blindbandit.name: Blind Bandit
blindbandit.desc: oPulling a ... someone.r\nA mob called the "Blind Bandit" will sometimes be summoned for a limited time after you attack or are attacked. She will attack hostile mobs, and will also attack those who dare attack her (except you), piercing armor on mobs.

synergy.name: Synergy
synergy.desc:
oLook ma, no moss!r
Will repair itself if you have Steeleaves in your hotbar.

tconevo.stifling_armor.name: Stifling
tconevo.stifling_armor.desc: oLike punching a rock!r\nThis armour weakens attackers.

tconevo.null_almighty_armor.name: Null Almighty
tconevo.null_almighty_armor.desc: oThe power of the trickster!r\nThis armour grants 25% resistance to all incoming damage.

tconevo.draconic_shield_capacity_armor.name: Shield Capacity
tconevo.draconic_shield_capacity_armor.desc: oDeflector shields up!r\nThis armour can sustain a larger energy shield.

tconevo.attuned_horologium_armor.name: Attuned (Horologium)
tconevo.attuned_horologium_armor.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis armour piece is aligned with Horologium and freezes attackers in time.

tconevo.gaia_will_guthan_armor.name: Will of Guthan
tconevo.gaia_will_guthan_armor.desc: oDusty ol' tome.r\nCritical Hits heal for a portion of damage dealt.

tconevo.energized1_armor.name: Energized
tconevo.energized1_armor.desc: oBatteries included!r\nThis armour consumes an internal energy buffer before durability.

tconevo.soul_rend3.name: Soul Rend III
tconevo.soul_rend3.desc: oSoul steal!r\nThis weapon has innate soul-stealing abilities.

im_a_superstar.name: I'm a Superstar
im_a_superstar.desc: oI am a superstar![falls into the toilet]r\nEffects depend on the player's attunement.

portly.name: Portly Gentleman
portly.desc: oTesting nuclear bombs off the Korean coast, oh yeah!r\nShift-right-click an entity to capture it (costs durability based on entity health). Press the "release entity" key (default "0") in order to release it.

tconevo.deadly_precision.name: Deadly Precision
tconevo.deadly_precision.desc: oJust buy six daedalus 4Headr\nThis weapon deals greatly increased damage on critical strikes.

coldblooded.name: Cold-Blooded
coldblooded.desc: oSavage!r\nDeal increased damage to targets at full health.

tconevo.attuned_aevitas_armor.name: Attuned (Aevitas)
tconevo.attuned_aevitas_armor.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis armour piece is aligned with Aevitas and grants regeneration after taking damage.

tconevo.soul_rend2.name: Soul Rend II
tconevo.soul_rend2.desc: oSoul steal!r\nThis weapon has innate soul-stealing abilities.

condition_overload.name: Condition: Overload
condition_overload.desc: Deal increased damage based on how many negative potion effects are on the target.

enderport_armor.name: Enderport
enderport_armor.desc: oJust in time!r\nMight teleport you out of dangerous situations.

freezing.name: Freezing
freezing.desc: oWinter is Comingr\nSuccessful hits slow your target more and more.

rough_armor.name: Rough
rough_armor.desc: oPlease don't touch.r\nDamages attackers on contact based on durability.

ambitious_armor.name: Ambitious
ambitious_armor.desc: oOn your way to glory!r\nYou gain additional XP.

uplifting.name: Uplifting
uplifting.desc: oThis day we fight!r\nOccasionally regenerates health on use.

ecological.name: Ecological
ecological.desc: oGreen Power!r\nRenewable resources are so good, they regenerate by themselves!

tconevo.gaia_will_dharok_armor.name: Will of Dharok
tconevo.gaia_will_dharok_armor.desc: oIS COOKING!r\nCritical Hit damage increases with lower HP.

mending_moss.name: Mending Moss
mending_moss.desc: oIt's alive!r\nPicked up XP is stored in the tool. It will slowly use up the XP to regenerate durability.

tconevo.modifiable1.name: Modifiable
tconevo.modifiable1.desc: oThe infinite spring!r\nThis equipment has additional free modifier slots.

apocalypse.name: Apocalypse
apocalypse.desc: oThe end times...r\nYour victim becomes moribund and is afflicted with increasing levels of Wither.

tasty_armor.name: Tasty
tasty_armor.desc: oOm Nom Nomr\nSmells so good...You'd rather eat your armor than starve.

dunanstransport_armor.name: Dunans Transport
dunanstransport_armor.desc: oThe FedEx of one square foot of landr\nBonus armor protection and toughness for riding players.

raging1.name: Raging
raging1.desc: oA desperate solution!r\nYour tool does more damage the lower your health is.

tconevo.ruination.name: Ruination
tconevo.ruination.desc: oI met a traveller...r\nThis weapon deals damage scaling with enemy health on fully-charged hits.

jagged.name: Jagged
jagged.desc: oMoves like jagged!r\nEvery point durability lost increases damage.

enderport-1.name: Vanishing
enderport-1.desc:
oOut of my way!r
Chance to teleport enemies away.

tconevo.willful.name: Willful
tconevo.willful.desc: oYour soul is mine!r\nThis weapon severs the strands of demonic will that bind its enemies.

tconevo.warping_armor.name: Warping
tconevo.warping_armor.desc: oStrange whispers reveal secrets...r\nThis accursed plate saps at the sanity of those that would strike it.

tconevo.spectral_armor.name: Spectral
tconevo.spectral_armor.desc: oIt's all a blur!r\nThis armour grants its wearer a chance to evade incoming attacks.

thermalinversion.name: Thermal Inversion
thermalinversion.desc: oHot & Cold!r\nHitting an enemy in a hot or cold environment will chill or burn them.

tconevo.divine_grace_armor.name: Divine Grace
tconevo.divine_grace_armor.desc: oSupport's on the way!r\nThis armour amplifies received healing.

splintering.name: Splintering
splintering.desc: oA souvenir for your enemies!r\nHit them more to deal more damage.

tconevo.energized2.name: Energized II
tconevo.energized2.desc: oBatteries included!r\nThis tool consumes an internal energy buffer before durability.

tconevo.attuned_octans.name: Attuned (Octans)
tconevo.attuned_octans.desc: oEffervescent!r\nThis tool is aligned with Octans and is more efficient in water.

tconevo.fluxed.name: Fluxed
tconevo.fluxed.desc: oIt's been years!r\nThis tool consumes energy before durability.

mirabile.name: Mirabile Visu
mirabile.desc: oWonderful to seer\nOccasionally, a gold or diamond ore will appear in stone immediately surrounding you (at the cost of durability).

resistant_armor.name: Resistant
resistant_armor.desc: oHarder, stronger!r\nAdditional protection against all attacks.

glitch.name: Glitch
glitch.desc: oCatch an exception!r\nDrops Glitch Heart sometimes when killing.

darkside_armor.name: The Dark Side
darkside_armor.desc:
oUnder the cover of darkness!
rYour armor loves the dark so much; you take less damage when in darkness.

projectile_resistant_armor.name: Projectile Resistant
projectile_resistant_armor.desc: oCome closer, you cowards!r\nAdditional protection against projectile attacks.

lifecycle.name: Cycle of Life
lifecycle.desc:
oFrom one to another.
rWhen your tool is damaged, you are healed for the damaged amount.

mentor.name: Mentor
mentor.desc:
oPower of knowledge
rEach hit consumes 1 XP level (for each part) but deals additional (XP * parts) damage

tconevo.cascading.name: Cascading
tconevo.cascading.desc: oIt's all coming down!r\nThis tool destroys falling blocks in columns.

chadthunder.name: Chad Thunder****
chadthunder.desc: oThe virgin killing by weapon alone vs the CHAD killing by thunder strikesr\nEnemies struck by this weapon have thunderbolts rained down on them.

tconevo.draconic_dig_speed.name: Dig Speed
tconevo.draconic_dig_speed.desc: oNow, this is pod racing!r\nThis tool has increased mining speed.

bloodlust.name: Bloodlust
bloodlust.desc: oI want more blood.r\nAdds life essence to your soul network when killing.

antimagic_armor.name: Anti-Magic
antimagic_armor.desc:
oNihilistic!
rYour armor doesn't believe in potions, and refuses to be affected by any potion effects; good or bad.

prickly.name: Prickly
prickly.desc: oOuch!r\nNobody is safe from those thorns, they always hurt.

featherweight_armor.name: Featherweight
featherweight_armor.desc: oLight as a feather.r\nYou're so light, you take less fall damage.

fire_resistant_armor.name: Fire Resistant
fire_resistant_armor.desc: oImmolation is bad.r\nAdditional protection against fire.

tconevo.electric.name: Electric
tconevo.electric.desc: oHAYO!r\nThis tool consumes electricity before durability.

stalwart.name: Stalwart
stalwart.desc:
oThe Brave and Bold.r
Hitting an entity can make you feel emboldened.

combustible_armor.name: Combustible
combustible_armor.desc: oThis armor is on fiiiire!r\nSets fire to surrounding creatures when ignited.

withering_armor.name: Withering
withering_armor.desc: oWe may have years, we may have hours...r\nWithers enemies on contact.

tconevo.phoenix_aspect_armor.name: Aspect of the Phoenix
tconevo.phoenix_aspect_armor.desc: oHeroes never die!r\nThis armour sacrifices itself to save its wearer from death.

tconevo.electric_armor.name: Electric
tconevo.electric_armor.desc: oHAYO!r\nThis armour consumes electricity before durability.

unnatural.name: Unnatural
unnatural.desc: oAbomination!r\nThe tool mines faster the higher its mining level is above the required one.

endorium.name: Rage
endorium.desc: oWhere is physics!?r\nCritical strike increases attack speed.

enderport-0.name: Vanishing III
enderport-0.desc:
oOut of my way!r
Chance to teleport enemies away.

superheat.name: Superheat
superheat.desc: oTurn up the heat!r\nDeal bonus damage to enemies on fire.

tconevo.modifiable2.name: Modifiable II
tconevo.modifiable2.desc: oThe infinite spring!r\nThis equipment has additional free modifier slots.

goodfridayagreement_armor.name: Good Friday Agreement
goodfridayagreement_armor.desc: oTroubles over?r\nIron golems will not attack a player having this trait.

tconevo.radiant_armor.name: Radiant
tconevo.radiant_armor.desc: oShines like the sun!r\nThis armour briefly blinds attackers.

shulking.name: Shulking
shulking.desc: oUp up and away!r\nHitting foes causes them to float away.

tconevo.gaia_will_torag_armor.name: Will of Torag
tconevo.gaia_will_torag_armor.desc: oDusty ol' tome.r\nCritical Hits apply a strong slowness effect.

magnetic2_armor.name: Magnetic II
magnetic2_armor.desc: oAttractive armor!r\nItems can't help but be drawn to you.

tconevo.gaia_will_verac_armor.name: Will of Verac
tconevo.gaia_will_verac_armor.desc: oDusty ol' tome.r\nCritical Hits pierce through armor.

tconevo.condensing1.name: Condensing
tconevo.condensing1.desc: oTry not to think about it.r\nSlain foes and broken blocks may leave behind a smattering of neutrons.

vis_equilibrium.name: Vis Equilibrium
vis_equilibrium.desc: Depending on vis in aura your tool have better stats.

tconevo.fae_voice_armor.name: Voice of the Fae
tconevo.fae_voice_armor.desc: oHey, listen!r\nThis armour may summon pixies to ward off attackers.

tconevo.draconic_move_speed_armor.name: Move Speed
tconevo.draconic_move_speed_armor.desc: oSweet dreams are made of this...r\nThis armour grants increased movement speed.

tconevo.blasting.name: Blasting
tconevo.blasting.desc: oI don't even think once!r\nThis tool produces explosive results.

tconevo.sentient_armor.name: Sentient
tconevo.sentient_armor.desc: oIt knows what you've done...r\nThis armour consumes demon will to increase its power.

tconevo.foot_fleet.name: Fleet of Foot
tconevo.foot_fleet.desc: oStay still--I'm trying to shoot you!r\nThis weapon grants a burst of speed to its wielder on fully-charged hits.

mundane1_armor.name: Mundane
mundane1_armor.desc: oWeapons are for chumps!r\nBonus protection against unarmed attackers.

darktraveler.name: Dark Traveler
darktraveler.desc: oAll hail...the King of Chaos!r\nSurrounding mobs get randomly afflicted with damage.

reinforced_armor.name: Reinforced
reinforced_armor.desc: oSo strong!r\nEach level adds a 10% chance to not use durability.

tconevo.eternity_armor.name: Eternity
tconevo.eternity_armor.desc: oFalling in and out of time...r\nThis armour grants the immortality effect.

brownmagic.name: Brown Magic
brownmagic.desc: oYou're weird.r\nPress the "set portal" key (default "N") to set a virtual portal on the block you are pointing at. By default, press "Y" to teleport there (if there is enough space).

psicological.name: Psicological
psicological.desc: o...the reverse kindr\nTools heal with Psi.

luck.name: Luck
luck.desc: oShiny!r\nYou're getting all the nice things. And a lot of them.

starfishy.name: Starfishy
starfishy.desc: o2+2=5r\nPress the "set portal" key (default "N") to set a virtual portal on the block you are pointing at. If you are on the brink of death, you have 32 enori crystals to spare, and the portal has enough space above, then the crystals are consumed, you are teleported to the virtual portal, and you are spared. (The tool must be in your hand.)

flammable.name: Flammable
flammable.desc: oCan't have enough fire!r\nBlocking blocks fire damage and getting hit sets the attacker on fire.

tconevo.eternal_density2.name: Eternal Density II
tconevo.eternal_density2.desc: oFlower power!r\nThis weapon condenses the energy from its strikes into EMC.

magnetic1.name: Magnetic
magnetic1.desc: oHow do they work?!r\nHitting things attracts nearby things?!

tconevo.aura_affinity1_armor.name: Aura Affinity
tconevo.aura_affinity1_armor.desc: oWarp included!r\nThis armour reduces vis costs.

antigravity.name: Anti-Gravity
antigravity.desc: Onwards!r\nThe arrow will maintain its height and will not be effected by gravity for the duration of the flight. Where you aim, it flies.

crude2.name: Crude II
crude2.desc: oArmor is for cowards!r\nBonus damage against unarmored targets.

eldritch_retribution_armor.name: Eldritch Retribution
eldritch_retribution_armor.desc: Opponents who dare to oppose you will suffer the consequences.

morganlefay.name: Morgan Le Fay
morganlefay.desc: oLancelot...r\nBonus magic damage (ranging from 0.0 to 5.0; Gaussian distributed) is afflicted (it is absolute).

webbed.name: Webbed
webbed.desc: oYuck!r\nEntangle your foes in cobwebs, slowing them.

tconevo.mortal_wounds.name: Mortal Wounds
tconevo.mortal_wounds.desc: oA mortal reminder!r\nThis weapon reduces the enemy's healing for a duration.

haorans_cult_armor.name: Haoran's Cult
haorans_cult_armor.desc: oHarry, harry on the wall, who's the hairiest of them all?r\nWhen withered, reduces HP of all mobs in a certain range by 30% every second.

tconevo.eternal_density1.name: Eternal Density
tconevo.eternal_density1.desc: oFlower power!r\nThis weapon condenses the energy from its strikes into EMC.

tconevo.executor.name: Executor
tconevo.executor.desc: oSee ya!r\nThis weapon deals bonus damage based on the target's missing health.

exnihilo_smashing.name: Smashing
exnihilo_smashing.desc: rSmashing baby, yeaaah!\nrBreaks things into smaller things

illuminati.name: Illuminati
illuminati.desc: oConfirmed!r\nWhile the tool is in your hand, nearby entities (that do not hold a tool with this trait) glow, and you become invisible.

speedy_armor.name: Speedy
speedy_armor.desc: oGotta go fast!r\nIncreases your overall movement speed.

hellish.name: Hellish
hellish.desc: oFrom down below!r\nDeal bonus damage to non-Nether mobs.

tconevo.draconic_energy_armor.name: RF Capacity
tconevo.draconic_energy_armor.desc: oUnlimited power!r\nThis armour has increased energy capacity.

devilsstrength.name: Devil's Strength
devilsstrength.desc: oRivaling Satan...r\nBonus damage to non-Overworld mobs.

tconevo.will_strength_armor.name: Strength of Will
tconevo.will_strength_armor.desc: oMaintaining focus!r\nThis armour grants immortality when hit at full health.

camdaibay_armor.name: Cam Dai Bay
camdaibay_armor.desc: oNo, it's not some bay in Vietnam!r\nIf the player is attacked and is blocking, inflicts the player's negative status effects on the attacker.

tconevo.photovoltaic.name: Photovoltaic
tconevo.photovoltaic.desc: oEmissions-free!r\nThis tool absorbs sunlight to recharge itself.

tconevo.soul_guard_armor.name: Soul Guard
tconevo.soul_guard_armor.desc: oOn that day, the reaper laid down his scythe...r\nThis armour siphons its user's life essence to mitigate a portion of incoming damage.

vis_equilibrium_armor.name: Vis Equilibrium
vis_equilibrium_armor.desc: Depending on vis in aura your tool have better stats.

tconevo.bulwark_armor.name: Bulwark
tconevo.bulwark_armor.desc: oBlocked!r\nThis armour reduces incoming damage by one heart, to a minimum of one heart.

hovering.name: Hovering
hovering.desc: oFree like the windr\nProjectiles move slower but don't mind gravity as much.

tconevo.rejuvenating.name: Rejuvenating
tconevo.rejuvenating.desc: oYour weapons betray you!r\nThis weapon applies regeneration to attacked targets.

flame2.name: Inferno II
flame2.desc: Burn baby burn!r\nSets enemies on fire for 15 seconds with added knockbacks, and deals additional dragon flame damage.

necrotic.name: Necrotic
necrotic.desc: oI feel so Alive!!r\nHitting enemies returns health to you depending on damage dealt.

forbidden.name: Forbidden
forbidden.desc: Provides various debuffs to enemy and damage scalling depending on user's warp.

smite.name: Smite
smite.desc: oFor Justice!r\nDeal massive damage to undead.

tconevo.corrupting.name: Corrupting
tconevo.corrupting.desc: oA glimpse of the void...r\nThis weapon inflicts increasing wither on fully-charged hits.

tconevo.mana_affinity1_armor.name: Mana Affinity
tconevo.mana_affinity1_armor.desc: oWarp not included!r\nThis armour reduces mana costs.

tconevo.second_wind_armor.name: Second Wind
tconevo.second_wind_armor.desc: oThe wind... it is blowing...r\nThis armour provides regeneration after being attacked.

crude1.name: Crude
crude1.desc: oArmor is for cowards!r\nBonus damage against unarmored targets.

researcher.name: Researcher
researcher.desc: Based on your research in thaumonomicon, there are various effects!

tconevo.warping.name: Warping
tconevo.warping.desc: oStrange whispers reveal secrets...r\nThis accursed weapon saps at the sanity of those that bear its strikes.

precipitate.name: Precipitate
precipitate.desc:
oThe last standing escape plan.r
The less health you have, the speedier it is!

tconevo.celestial_armor.name: Celestial
tconevo.celestial_armor.desc: oAbyssal wings!r\nThis armour grants creative flight.

tconevo.reaping.name: Reaping
tconevo.reaping.desc: oDark metamorphosis!r\nThis weapon has an additional chance to drop mob souls.

alien_armor.name: Alien
alien_armor.desc: oThe stats feel off...r\n..as if they're changing! Maybe time will tell?

vis_siphon.name: Vis Siphon
vis_siphon.desc: Repairs tool using local vis in aura.

glowing.name: Glowing
glowing.desc: oShine brightr\nWhenever it gets too dark your tool sacrifices a part of itself to light up your way.

poisonous.name: Poisonous
poisonous.desc: oNot exactly lead-free!r\nPoisons enemies on hit.

tom_and_jerry_armor.name: Tom and Jerry
tom_and_jerry_armor.desc: o[laughs in flattening Tom]r\nExplosions caused by a user with this trait slow down those affected.
